product_name: ExOfficio Pocatello Macro Plaid Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With mesh venting to keep you cool and a zippered chest pocket that guards small essentials, the ExOfficio Pocatello Macro Plaid shirt is built for enjoying beachside BBQs or a game of frisbee. Lightweight, breathable cotton/polyester blend feels soft against skin. Mesh venting on back shoulders; exterior zippered chest pocket; off-the-shoulder seams. Closeout.
short_description: With mesh venting to keep you cool and a zippered chest pocket that guards small essentials, the ExOfficio Pocatello Macro Plaid shirt is built for enjoying beachside BBQs or a game of frisbee.
